title: Slow cooker honey, mustard and garlic chicken thighs
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/2 teaspoon dried thyme', '1/2 teaspoon paprika', '8 skinless, boneless chicken thighs', '2 teaspoons vegetable oil', '3 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '4 tablespoons honey', '2 tablespoons Dijon mustard', '120ml chicken stock', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
